sentences.en: He indulged in gentle raillery at God with closed doors.
sentences.cn: 他常在人后偷偷嘲笑上帝.

sentences.en: He was gifted, on occasion, with a gentle raillery, which almost always concealed a serious meaning.
sentences.cn: 他一有机会, 总爱说一些温和的讥诮言词, 但几乎每次都含着严正的意义.

sentences.en: Prince Charles does not escape raillery from others.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯王子也难逃人们善意的嘲弄。
